todos.title: Motivate
todos.body: With clear expectations and positive feedback.

todos.title: To Don't List
todos.body: Write down things that aren't worth your time.

todos.title: Pay Attention to Your Brain
todos.body: When you are feeling your best do high concentration activities, when you are not work on mindless and routine tasks.

todos.title: Complain
todos.body: Present your beef but always follow it up with solutions for improvement.

todos.title: File Everything Right
todos.body: Organize so you know where things are.

todos.title: Three item meeting
todos.body: Keep meetings short and only focus on three things or less.

todos.title: Forward the Important
todos.body: Forward important e-mails to your text.  Turn off e-mail on phone.

todos.title: Be Lazy
todos.body: Don't work as many hours and you will be forced to make the time you do work extra efficient.  People that work over 49 hours a week have decreasing productivity.

todos.title: Chunking
todos.body: Chunk actions that take similar brainpower.

todos.title: HVT
todos.body: Assign yourself high value targets at the start of every day.
